skills.title: Javascript
skills.description: Solid understanding of JavaScript, covering variables, control flow, and asynchronous operations. Proficient in DOM manipulation, event handling, and callbacks. Actively exploring ES6+ features and modern JavaScript frameworks.

skills.title: Git And GitHub

portfolio.title: Movie Recommendation Website
portfolio.description: Developed as the culmination of the CS50 course, this website employs Python and Flask for the backend, complemented by JavaScript for AJAX requests. The platform generates personalized movie recommendations based on user quiz responses. Utilizing the TMDb API, the website taps into a vast movie database to enhance the user experience.

portfolio.title: URL shortening platform
portfolio.description: Developed as the final project for the CS50 Web course, this URL shortening website features a secure authentication system. Utilizing Django for the backend and incorporating JavaScript, CSS, and Bootstrap, the platform offers a user-friendly dashboard. Users can effortlessly create, manage, and delete shortened URLs while accessing detailed analytics. The analytics include click counts, geographic distribution, device-specific insights, and trending click patterns.

portfolio.title: LinkedIn Clone
portfolio.description: Designed as a LinkedIn clone, this project prioritizes a seamless user experience with features such as secure authentication and Firebase integration for both database management and user authentication. The platform enables users to create and share posts. Built with React and enhanced with Material-UI, the clone mirrors the familiar LinkedIn interface.
